name: Tooltip
description: Hover-triggered tooltip overlays with themed containers.

use: you need brief text hints on hover or focus.
you want themed tooltip containers and overlay behavior.
avoid: users need rich content or interactive controls (use `hover_card`).

examples.minimal:
Tooltip(
  child: const Icon(Icons.info_outline),
  tooltip: (context) => const Text('More info'),
)

patterns.title: Instant tooltip
patterns.code:
InstantTooltip(
  child: const Text('Hover'),
  tooltipBuilder: (context) => const Text('Instant'),
)

theming: `TooltipTheme` controls surface blur, padding, and typography.
accessibility: Pair tooltips with visible labels when possible.
